name: Epic Encounters: Extreme Weather and Terrain: Air
name_original: Epic Encounters: Extreme Weather and Terrain: Air
description:
Unleash Extreme Weather and Terrain to Create Epic Encounters in Minutes! From MageGate Games, publishers of the bestselling 250 Best Magic Items books, comes a whole new series of rules templates for 5th Edition GMs. Use them to quickly and easily spice up encounters, travel, and especially boss fights! 

Each Epic Encounters pack comes with a variety of magical and nonmagical weather and/or terrain templates themed by elemental, extraplanar, or damage type. Collect all 10 template packs and never run out of ideas again! 

This Air pack is perfect for any GM running encounters using air elementals, blue or bronze dragons, cloud or storm giants, as well as campaigns featuring flying creatures or monsters that live high up in hills, mountains, or in the clouds themselves. 

In this extreme template pack, you get environment rules as well as new monsters and treasure ideas for:

  • Cloud Castle (magical terrain)
  • High Elevation (nonmagical terrain)
  • Lightning Storm (nonmagical terrain)
  • Thunderstorm (nonmagical terrain)
  • Tornado (nonmagical terrain)
  • Windstorm (nonmagical terrain)

We also give you options to increase the threat level of our magical terrains, right down to granting hostile creatures in them limited spell lists and/or other fun terrain-themed abilities!

This 5th Edition (5e) handbook is perfect for GMs who want to add epic fun and variety to your Fifth Edition game.

To use this 5e supplement, you also need a copy of the PHB, DMG, and MM from the world's greatest roleplaying game.

Epic Encounters: Extreme Weather and Terrain release dates:

  1. Acid (January 29, 2022)
  2. Air (February 3, 2022)
  3. Cold (February 10, 2022)
  4. Earth (February 17, 2022)
  5. Fire (February 24, 2022)
  6. Necrotic (March 3, 2022)
  7. Poison (March 10, 2022)
  8. Radiant (March 17, 2022)
  9. Spirit (March 24, 2022)
  10. Water (March 31, 2022)
